text: Madden NFL 08 is a video game about the National Football League (NFL) for the Xbox, Xbox 360, PlayStation 2, PlayStation 3, PlayStation Portable, Wii, GameCube, PC, Mac and Nintendo DS. Former Tennessee Titans quarterback Vince Young is on the cover. == References == Category:2007 video games Category:Madden NFL Category:Electronic Arts video games Category:Nintendo DS games Category:Nintendo GameCube games Category:Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection games Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:PlayStation 3 games Category:PlayStation Portable games Category:Video games developed in the United States Category:Xbox games Category:Xbox 360 games Category:Wii games Category:Wii Wi-Fi games
title: Madden NFL 08
